merchandise.title: From wence it all began
merchandise.imageAlt: Empty whiskey bottle from the first first durt nurs' jam session
merchandise.description: The ultimate collectors item.  Polished off in Dickey's basement as he pounded on the kit with broom handles.  It was the first night of mayhem with the original trio. For an extra $100 we'll even sign it for you.  We just need to find out what happened to Dickey.

merchandise.title: The Holy Flask
merchandise.imageAlt: A flask with questionable religious iconography
merchandise.description: 8oz of spiritual enlightenment awaits. Engraved with 'In Robes We Trust.' BYO bourbon.

merchandise.title: Vintage Tour Shirt
merchandise.imageAlt: Faded t-shirt from a tour that never happened
merchandise.description: From our 1997 'Empty Room' tour. The one show we played. To ourselves. Pre-distressed for authenticity.

merchandise.title: Sacred Coffee Mug
merchandise.imageAlt: A mug that has seen things
merchandise.description: Holds 12oz of regret. Text reads: 'I survived a dURT nURS' show (barely).' Microwave safe. Your sanity is not.

merchandise.title: Autographed Air Guitar
merchandise.imageAlt: Invisible guitar with very real signatures
merchandise.description: Signed by both band members. Includes certificate of authenticity (not authentic). Strings sold separately (they don't exist).

salesBanner.message: FLASH SALE: Everything 100% off! (We'll pay YOU to take this stuff)
salesBanner.subtext: Offer valid until we change our minds
